Description: Painted wooden shabti of Imy-r mrt Imn-m-int with blue lappet-wig, a modelled yellow face with coloured features, a red, black and blue collar and parallel brown hands in relief with bracelets holding black hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs on a yellow ground flanked by red lines; the back is decorated with a representation of a red yoke with pendular nw-pots and a seed-basket above red and yellow bands.
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
